PageWidgetPortable.Title: Estoque terceiros
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>AGA_PD_MOVIMENTACAOTERCEIROTOTAIS.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>5</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>(A.ALMOXARIFADO = @RASTRO(PD_ALMOXARIFADOS) AND (A.PRODUTO = (SELECT PRODUTO FROM PD_ALMOXARIFADOPRODUTOS WHERE HANDLE = @RASTRO(PD_ALMOXARIFADOPRODUTOS))))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t3307_at5384_hsa708f709.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Histórico de alterações de reposição
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>AGA_PD_STATUS.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>5</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>(A.HANDLETABELAORIGEM IN (SELECT B.HANDLE FROM Z_TABELAS B WHERE B.NOME = 'PD_ALMOXARIFADOPRODUTOS') AND A.HANDLEREGISTROORIGEM = @RASTRO(PD_ALMOXARIFADOPRODUTOS))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1951_at3283_hs881a428b.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Lotes
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>AGA_PD_TANQUELOTES.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>5</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.ALMOXARIFADO = @RASTRO(PD_ALMOXARIFADOS) AND A.PRODUTO = (SELECT B.PRODUTO FROM PD_ALMOXARIFADOPRODUTOS B WHERE B.HANDLE = @RASTRO(PD_ALMOXARIFADOPRODUTOS))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1548_at1503_hsce34dbee.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Variações
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>AGA_PD_ALMOXARIFADOVARIACOES.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>5</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>0</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.FAMILIA = @CAMPO(FAMILIA) AND A.PRODUTO = @CAMPO(PRODUTO) AND A.ALMOXARIFADO = (SELECT HANDLE FROM PD_ALMOXARIFADOS WHERE HANDLE = @CAMPO(ALMOXARIFADO))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1511_at1559_hs239d2b4b.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
